public
ICamera

CRefCount
_declspec(align(16))
CCamera

Implements ICamera

Members
m_leftHanded

Indicates if camera uses left or right handed coordinates

m_FOV

Field of view in radians

m_AspectRation

Aspect ratio of the output camera

m_NearZ

Near clipping plane in meters

m_FarZ

Far clipping plane in meters

m_Eye

Position of camera in world coordinates (in meters)

m_Look

Point camera is looking at in world coordinates (in meters)

m_Up

Up vector

m_offset

Additional offset added to camera's position (in meters)

m_Pers

Current perspective matrix

m_View

Current view matrix (world to camera transform)

Module

import Rendering.Caustic.Camera;
